name: Living Arrow (Anime)
text:
Activate 1 of the following effects:
? Discard 1 Spell Card; The effect of that Spell Card is applied to the other player instead.
? When your opponent activates a Spell Card that targets exactly 1 monster (and no other cards) on the field: Target another card that would be an appropriate target; that Spell now targets the new target.
? Target 1 Spell Card in your opponent's GY; use that card's effect as this card's effect.
? Discard 1 "Polymerization"; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster to either player's field from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or from either player's field as Fusion Material.
